customer_name: Atlanta Wild Animal Rescue Effort Inc
site_name: Atlanta Wild Animal Rescue Effort Inc

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on March
26, 2025. The inspector talked on the phone to the licensee who was not available for inspection today. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on March 
26, 2025. The inspector talked on the phone to the licensee who was not available for inspection today. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
